Interface MaterializedFrame

All Superinterfaces:
Frame, VirtualFrame
public interface MaterializedFrame extends VirtualFrame
Represents a materialized frame containing values of local variables of the guest language. It can be created using the Frame.materialize() method. Instances of this type are the only frame instances that may be stored in fields or cast to Object.
Since:
0.8 or earlier
